items.title: No plan to turn Vi into PSU; Govt cannot hold over 49% equity in telcos, says Jyotiraditya Scindia
items.description: Every operator has the right to seek equity conversion, but final call will rest with DoT and Finance Ministry, Communications Minister Jyotiraditya Scindia said.

items.title: Ola, Uber, Rapido rides set to get expensive during peak hours as Centre revises rules
items.description: The move is likely to hike the cost of travel at a time when some states are enforcing a strict fuel ban on old vehicles, adding to anxiety over rising cost pressures

items.title: Gabriel India: Unlocking new doors of opportunities
items.description: The company recently announced a demerger scheme. This move will transform Gabriel from a single product company into a highly diversified mobility solutions provider.

items.title: Crizac Ltd IPO — Is this EdTech flotation worth the bet?
items.description: Tech-driven, asset-light B2B platform targeting global student mobility, with efforts underway to reduce UK dependence

items.title: June jitters for automobile demand
items.description: Q1 of FY26 mixed for automakers as domestic demand remained soft while relief came from  exports

items.title: SoftBank’s Ampere deal faces in-depth US probe in threat to AI ambitions
items.description: Only a small portion of deals face such follow-up requests. In some instances investigations can last for a year or more and are a precursor to a lawsuit to block the deal
